repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.unittitle: Troy Area Labor Council AFL-CIO Records
did.abstract: Documents an association of labor unions in or near Troy, NY.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed in 1990 by Geoffrey A. Huth .

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: All items in this manuscript group were donated to the University Libraries, M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, by the Troy Area Labor Council, AFL-CIO. A few items (the president's correspondence and some of the minutes) were photocopied and placed with the rest of the collection. This manuscript group was preserved as a part of the Harry Van Arsdale, Jr., Labor History Project.

bioghist.head: Organizational Sketch
bioghist.p: Association of labor unions in or near Troy, NY. The labor council is the successor to either the Troy Trades' Assembly (founded in 1864) or the Workingmen's Trades' Assembly (founded in 1882).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains minutes, 1981–1989; correspondence, 1975–1988; constitution and by–laws, 1987; and dinner journals, 1969–1983.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this record group is unrestricted.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming with the laws of copyright. Whenever possible, the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives will provide information about copyright owners and other restrictions, but the legal determination ultimately rests with the researcher. Requests for permission to publish material from this collection should be discussed with the Head of Special Collections and Archives.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: This collection has no series, arranged alphabetically.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, Troy Area Labor Council AFL-CIO Records, 1942, 1969-1989 . M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as [shortened name]).
